Articles.Content:
2 hours before scheduled launch, and this happens......

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/screenshot115_zps48d521c9.png' alt='screenshot115_zps48d521c9.png'>

All Launches and mission parameters are on hold, THE GAME IS ON, and no one can find any Crew members, mission controllers, fire technitians........
I don't understand what is happening here.

I don't understand what is happening here.

Same, glad it's not just me! LOL

Oh my god, ok, take a close look at the flag in the hanger, The GAME IS ON, just because my Kerbals are green and idiots, don't mean they don't enjoy FOOTBALL. Here in the heartland, when the Game is on, everything stops dead.

Oh my god, ok, take a close look at the flag in the hanger, The GAME IS ON, just because my Kerbals are green and idiots, don't mean they don't enjoy FOOTBALL. Here in the heartland, when the Game is on, everything stops dead.

And you expect the entire world to know what's happening in your backyard?

And you expect the entire world to know what's happening in your backyard?

Lol, I see your point.
The first thing I noticed was the two Kerbals holding hands on the left, so I thought you were talking about Kerbals dating at work.
Staging is MESSED UP beyond recognition... YouÃ‚Â´ll need lots of personell to clear that junk, if you launch right now...
All personnel at my space center disappeared at about the same time . . . then I came back and found the rockets painted red.
Ah, I misunderstood "the game", I thought you meant KSP and I was thinking, well yeah it's on, obviously, you took a screenshot!

Staging is MESSED UP beyond recognition... YouÃ‚Â´ll need lots of personell to clear that junk, if you launch right now...

No the staging is fine

Ah, I misunderstood "the game"

And I just lost it.

And I just lost it.

Damn it.

I lost the game
